# Bannner

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                     | Type                                | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `state`  | `state`   | State of the banner.                            | `"error" \| "neutral" \| "warning"` | `'neutral'` |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | Adapts the banner color depending on the theme. | `"dark" \| "light"`                 | `'light'`   |
